analysis.description:
RLC.startDate (/unique_chucks/24/0xe7860fd151cbbad28141dfd4cc7cd6d090e4ead8.sol#108-109) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0xe7860fd151cbbad28141dfd4cc7cd6d090e4ead8.sol#217-229)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xe7860fd151cbbad28141dfd4cc7cd6d090e4ead8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/24/0xe7860fd151cbbad28141dfd4cc7cd6d090e4ead8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/24/0xe7860fd151cbbad28141dfd4cc7cd6d090e4ead8.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
